content: ***beginner-friendly crochet linen stitch baby blanket *** looking for an easy crochet baby blanket pattern that looks way more complicated than it is try this linen stitch baby blanket using three colors the striping technique used avoids tails for a joyous crochet experience finish with a simple linen stitch border and this blanket is ready for gifting free crochet pattern includes written instructions and helpful tutorial video ***adjusting the size*** - to adjust the size of your blanket start with any odd number of chains and work in pattern to your desired length
